Tompkins Avenue (right to left), at the intersection of Vanderbilt Avenue. The view is northeastward and shows, in the center, the old George W. Vanderbilt estate and house, at the N.E. corner of the two thoroughfares.

February 25, 1931

P. L. Sperr
